channel.description: Recent content in Computer Vision on Learn with AI

item.title: Object Detection
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about Object Detection ChatGPT answer: What is object detection and how does it differ from image classification or segmentation? What are the different types of object detection algorithms, and how do they work? What are some common challenges in object detection, such as occlusion or viewpoint variation, and how can they be addressed? How has object detection technology evolved over the years, and what are some of the latest advancements in the field?
